title: Tate McRae Prepares for โLegendary Februaryโ From Snowy Italian Alps Ahead of 2026 Winter Olympics & Super Bowl LX: Watch HerยPromo
summary: The Opening Ceremony of the 2026 Winter Olympics is set for Friday in Milan and the Super Bowl is Sunday, both on NBC.
body: Just keep watching. Tate McRae stars in NBCUniversal’s “Legendary February” campaign and finds the “Sports Car” singer preparing America for the 2026 Milan Cortina Olympic Winter Games and Super Bowl LX . This weekend is set to be a historic one for NBC. Friday (Feb. 6) marks the Opening Ceremony for the Winter Olympics, which will lead into the first competitions of the Olympics on Saturday (Feb. 7) and concludes with the Seattle Seahawks and New England Patriots facing off in Santa Clara, California, on Sunday (Feb. 8). Related Did Any Pop Star Level Up in 2025 Like Tate McRae? Billboardโs Greatest Pop Stars of 2025: No. 7 โ Tate McRae Chappell Roan, Tate McRae & More Surprising Artists Who Hit the Hot Country Songs Top 10 for the First Time in 2025 McRae treks through the snowy Italian Alps and welcomes viewers while rocking a red ski suit. The Canadian pop star takes directions from a talking owl and sets up the epic events on the way, which kick off with the Opening Ceremony. She spotlights the U.S. Figure Skating Team and shows love to skier Lindsay Vonn, who expects to be competing this weekend despite suffering a torn ACL juโฆ

title: Xavi & Grupo Fronteraโs โNo Capeaโ Banks Top Spot on Latin AirplayยChart
summary: Grupo Frontera doubles down on the Regional Mexican Airplay chart occupying the top two spots.
body: Xavi and Grupo Frontera combine forces on “No Capea,โ as the song climbs from No. 5 to No. 1 on Billboard โs Latin Airplay chart (dated Feb. 7). Their first team-up gives Xavi a third No. 1, while Frontera secures its fifth champ. โNo Capeaโ makes progress on the overall Latin radio ranking after a 40% gain in audience impressions, to 9.8 million, earned in the United States during the tracking week of Jan. 23-29, according to Luminate. Related Xavi Rings the New Year in Times Square & More Uplifting Moments in Latin Music This Week J Balvin & Xavi Honor Nir Seroussi as Latin Power Players Executive of the Year: ‘You Deserve This’ Grupo Frontera & Fuerza Regida Encourage Latinos to ‘Keep Heads Held High’ at 2026 Grammys Before reaching No. 1, โNo Capeaโ spent 10 nonconsecutive weeks in the top 10, bouncing in and out of the region a few times during its 18-week climb to the top. Last November, the track moved 31-7-14 but regained its top 10 position the following week (Nov. 8 chart, No. 9). Beginning with the Dec. 20 chart, after seven straight weeks in the top 10, it moved 8-21-25-23-19, rebounding to No. 8 on the chart datโฆ
